On the other hand, you must stop your bullshit! You care about the suffering of others, but not about your own rape and you display your pleasure without embarrassment? The name that the original author gave to Mashiro, symbolizes pure white and virtue. In other words, despite his profound moral ignorance. To make her act, ( in "mode", losing my virginity on a whim doesn't matter to me, I cry and recite the name of the man I love, I am afraid of being hated by him or hurting him and I see him sleeping with another because of me, but I don't show any resistance, I just say no a little before the end and shamelessly hold my rapist inside me, while moaning in front of everyone) it's contrary to the deep nature that the author gave him and very insulting... Even an innocent child is traumatized by a rape... Then, to see Misaki (beginning) and Aoyama reacting more negatively to their aggressions than Mashiro, it's ridiculous, she is more emotional than that... Fortunately, she did not come.

What is this unhealthy incubus community? There are always 10 times more comments about pedophilia, rape, corruption or infidelity, than on holy hentais, which respect the nature of the characters they draw instead of slandering them. And at least they, involving them only with their love interests. People are really deranged perverts, they prefer impurity, dirt, prohibitions, immorality, humiliation, sadism and all kind of trashy fantasies, to a sexuality that doesn't dirty your mind or make you puke with its mediocrity. No wonder I am a misanthrope... Of course, I'm talking to those who like this kind of filth... Also, it's not an entirely ntr either, it's more of a rape for two of the characters.
